summary: THERE ARE AT LEAST 3 CASES OF PASSENGER SIDE REAR AXLE CRACKED OR BROKEN REPORTED LATELY ON THE RIALTA TECH-GROUP, THE WEBSITE IS: HTTP://AUTOS.GROUPS.YAHOO.COM/GROUP/RIALTA-TECH/.  THIS FACT WARNED ME TO CHECK THE AXLE OF MY 2003 HD RIALTA,  I FOUND OUT THAT THE PASSENGER SIDE REAR AXLE, WHERE THE WHEEL AND BRAKE ARE MOUNTED, IS CRACKED.   THE CRACK IS A HAIR LINE SIZE, APPROXIMATELY 1/2" LONG, ON ONE SIDE OF THE MOUNTING FLANGE.  AS REPORTED ON THE RIALTA TECH-GROUP WEBSITE, THIS TYPE OF CRACK MIGHT PROPAGATE TO BOTH SIDE OF THE MOUNTING FLANGE THAT LEADS TO A TOTAL FAILURE OF THE AXLE.    *TR  UPDATED 01/28/14*LJ

2004 WINNEBAGO RIALTA MOTORHOME.  CARBON MONOXIDE LEAK.  CARBON MONOXIDE ALARM SAVED THE LIVES OF 2 PEOPLE AND 2 PETS WHILE RUNNING THE GENERATOR AND AIR CONDITIONING.  WINNEBAGO IS NOT WILLING TO TAKE ANY ACTION.  THIS HAPPENED AGAIN A FEW HOURS LATER.  THE VEHICLE, AS SUCH IS AN UN-USABLE DEATH TRAP.  *NM
